articles.content: "Hogwarts Legacy," the upcoming video game set in the world of Harry Potter from Warner Bros. Games, is already showing signs that it could be a hit even amid controversy over Potter creator J.K. Row… [+3411 chars]

articles.author: Luke Albigés
articles.title: Microsoft ending Windows 8 support today, multiple games affected - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Time is finally up for Windows 8, with support for Microsoft's legacy operating system set to end today. New app purchases won't be possible after today, although existing ones will still be usable with the sunset system.

articles.title: Tales of Symphonia Remastered - Gameplay Trailer - Nintendo Switch - Nintendo of America
articles.description: Tales of Symphonia Remastered is coming to Nintendo Switch on Feb. 17, 2023! Wishlist today: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/tales-of-symphonia-remas...
